channel.title: Npc help
channel.description: does anyone know how to put a level requirment on a npc? lets say a kbd and im lvl3 and i wanna kill it. it sends message you need 75 str to kill this monster. how would i code that in for any monster?

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

Look for packet

first click on npc ;;

Add;;

if(playerLevel[playerStrength] <= 75) { sendMessage("You need to have 75 Strength to attack this NPC."); } else { AttackNPC(); }

Read full topic
